analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: Lobho akusalamūlaṁ, doso akusalamūlaṁ, moho akusalamūlaṁ—
analyzed: lobhaḥ akusala mūla dosaḥ akusala mūla mohaḥ akusala mūla
imāni kho bhikkhave tīṇi akusala mūlāni iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
